title: Cowboys cut Zeke to give him chance at playoffs
description: The Cowboys have waived running back Ezekiel Elliott to give him a chance to land with a playoff contender.
author: Todd Archer

title: NBA suspends Rockets' Thompson, Heat's Rozier
description: Houston's Amen Thompson and Miami's Terry Rozier were each suspended, while four others were fined a total of $145,000 for their actions in Sunday's game.

title: 'Humble & popular but no plan B' - The inside story of Rooney at Plymouth
description: As Wayne Rooney leaves his latest managerial role with Plymouth, BBC Sport looks at where it went wrong for the legendary striker.

title: Transfer window opens - who could be on the move in January?
description: The January transfer window is a notoriously tricky time to do business. BBC Sport has taken a closer look at five high-profile players whose futures are likely to come under scrutiny over the next month.

title: CFP live updates: Heisman finalist Jeanty takes on Penn State
description: The final college football game of 2024 will determine the first semifinal participant in the College Football Playoff.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Louisville wins Sun Bowl 35-34 after Washington fails on 2-point conversion going for win
description: Washington narrowly missed a 2-point conversion and onside kick recovery in a thrilling Sun Bowl finish.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Rooney leaves Plymouth
description: Wayne Rooney has left Plymouth Argyle after a nine-game winless run left the club bottom of the Sky Bet Championship.

title: Southgate knighted in New Year Honours as Brundle and Hodgkinson recognised
description: Former England manager Gareth Southgate has been knighted in the 2025 New Year Honours list.
